*Assignment Day 1*

âœï¸ *Write an Essay on Carl Sagan*
Research and write an essay about the life, achievements, and contributions of Carl Sagan. Focus on his role in popularizing science, his work in astronomy, and his contributions to projects such as the Voyager Golden Record. Highlight his philosophy on the universe and humanity's place in it.

*Collect Information on Key Space Milestones*:
  *a) Golden Record* â€” Gather details about its purpose, contents, and significance.
  *b) Arecibo Message* â€” Explain the design, purpose, binary format.
  *c) Pioneer Plaque* â€” Describe its design, symbols, and meaning.

Explain how all three serve as messages from humanity to the universe.
